title: Senior Software Engineer I
summary: Python application development for a NIST contract; additional application development for Veterans Administration (VA).
responsibilities: Python application development: maintained and released a Python 3 GUI application for a password-creation research study; refactored legacy code, added automated unit tests, and stabilized the application.
Created an internal library over TKInter to simplify building new screens.
Instrumented the application for diagnostics/trace via logging to support issue investigation.
Release management: created build script, generated API documentation, and packaged the app to run without a pre-existing Python runtime.
.NET backend development (VA): created an Entity Framework data tier for an authentication store.
.NET application development (VA): enhanced a WIF single sign-on solution for self-configuration; built an HTTP/REST ASP.NET WebAPI interface and corresponding C#, JavaScript, and PHP clients.
Maintained WebForms/MS-Ajax and MVC 4 applications; created a WCF service layer and performed WCF performance tuning (serialization improvements and async via .NET 4.0 Task library).
Built a data import tool using ASP.NET, jQuery, and jQuery-UI with additional QA checks.

Front-end work: implemented HTML5 and TypeScript; requirejs module loading; converted existing JavaScript to TypeScript; implemented client-side error logging and testing data generation; contributed to Knockout.js databinding and underscore-based templates.
Created a workflow to periodically import a complex Drupal-based HTML template for reuse across ASP.NET WebForms and MVC apps.
Established an end-to-end automated TFS build customized for nUnit tests; wrote PowerShell scripts to automate build/deploy tasks.
